author: pderop
msg: 1) In the performTransition method, when we transit from WAITING_FOR_REQUIRED to INSTANTIATED_AND_WAITING_FOR_REQUIRED, then if the component's init callback has added
some instance-bound and *available* dependencies, then we must not notify the component listeners with the INSTANTIATED_AND_WAITING_FOR_REQUIRED state, which may
not be the current state anymore (when the component's init method adds some available dependencies, this triggers component state change to the TRACKING_OPTIONAL).

2) The getInstances method must not return the optional component lifecycle callback object, which is only used to call init/start/stop/destroy callbacks. (the getInstances method should only return the component composition instances).

msg: Event extends the Comparable interface, because all kind of events must be comparable.
